title: Lenovo’s Tab M11 is 20% CHEAPER Right Now
description: Get it for less than $200! The post Lenovo’s Tab M11 is 20% CHEAPER Right Now appeared first on Phandroid.
author: Mike Viray
text: With Black Friday basically here, we’re seeing a ton of different tech products go on sale at considerably lower prices for the next few days. In particular, Lenovo’s 2024 edition of the Tab M11 is likewise on sale at the moment, and it does come with some rather decent specs for buyers interested in getting a competent Android tablet. In terms of hardware, the tab M11 comes with an 11-inch FHD display, a MediaTek Helio G88 octa-core chipset and a 7,040mAh battery, which Lenovo claims will last up to 10 hours. It’s also geared towards productivity, and includes a bundled Tab Pen stylus for on-the-go note taking or the occasional sketch or doodle. You can check it out using the link below. Note: this article may contain affiliate links that help support our authors and keep the Phandroid servers running.
html:
With Black Friday basically here, we’re seeing a ton of different tech products go on sale at considerably lower prices for the next few days. In particular, Lenovo’s 2024 edition of the Tab M11 is likewise on sale at the moment, and it does come with some rather decent specs for buyers interested in getting a competent Android tablet.

In terms of hardware, the tab M11 comes with an 11-inch FHD display, a MediaTek Helio G88 octa-core chipset and a 7,040mAh battery, which Lenovo claims will last up to 10 hours. It’s also geared towards productivity, and includes a bundled Tab Pen stylus for on-the-go note taking or the occasional sketch or doodle. You can check it out using the link below.
